[@microsoft/fast-element](./fast-element.md) &gt; [booleanConverter](./fast-element.booleanconverter.md)

## booleanConverter variable

A [ValueConverter](./fast-element.valueconverter.md) that converts to and from `boolean` values.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
booleanConverter: ValueConverter
```

## Remarks

Used automatically when the `boolean` [AttributeMode](./fast-element.attributemode.md) is selected.
